abstract: General Dynamics and Northrop Grumman agreed to a Pentagon deal that clears the way for the multibillion-dollar destroyers to be built at G.D.’s shipyard in Maine.
snippet: General Dynamics and Northrop Grumman agreed to a Pentagon deal that clears the way for the multibillion-dollar destroyers to be built at G.D.’s shipyard in Maine.
lead_paragraph: Two military contractors, General Dynamics and Northrop Grumman, agreed on Wednesday to a Pentagon deal that will clear the way for all three of the Navy’s multibillion-dollar stealth destroyers to be built at General Dynamics’ shipyard in Maine, Pentagon and industry officials said.

headline.main: Contractors Agree on Deal to Build Stealth Destroyer
headline.print_headline: Contractors Agree on Deal To Build Stealth Destroyer

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
